1.brief: to walk (literally or figuratively); causatively, to carry (in various senses)
properly, to creak (or emit a stridulous sound), i.e. to shout (usually for joy)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to mar (especially by breaking); figuratively, to split the ears (with sound), i.e. shout (for alarm or joy)
properly, a cliff (or sharp rock, as compressed); generally, a rock or boulder; figuratively, a refuge; also an edge (as precipitous)

2.brief: to project (one self), i.e. precede; hence, to anticipate, hasten, meet (usually for help)
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
properly, an extension of the hand, i.e. (by implication) avowal, or (usually) adoration; specifically, a choir of worshippers
a song to be accompanied with instrumental music
to mar (especially by breaking); figuratively, to split the ears (with sound), i.e. shout (for alarm or joy)

3.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative

4.brief: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
properly, scrutinized, i.e. (by implication) a recess
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
(only in plural collective) weariness, i.e. (by implication) toil (treasure so obtained) or speed
a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)

5.brief: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.

a sea (as breaking in noisy surf) or large body of water; specifically (with the article), the Mediterranean Sea; sometimes a large river, or an artifical basin; locally, the west, or (rarely) the south

he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
to mould into a form; especially as apotter; figuratively, to determine (i.e. form a resolution)

6.brief: to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
to depress, i.e. prostrate (especially reflexive, in homage to royalty or God)
to bend the knee; by implication, to sink, to prostrate
to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason)
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application

7.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed

he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
a collective name for a flock (of sheep or goats); also figuratively (of men)
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)

8.brief: not (the qualified negation, used as a deprecative); once (Job 24:25) as a noun, nothing
properly, to be dense, i.e. tough or severe (in various applications)
the heart (as the most interior organ);
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
a testing, of men (judicial) or of God (querulous)
a pasture (i.e. open field, whither cattle are driven); by implication, a desert; also speech (including its organs)

9.brief: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
to test; by implication, to attempt
father, in a literal and immediate, or figurative and remote application
to test (especially metals); generally and figuratively, to investigate
properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)

10.brief: a year (as a revolution of time)
properly, to cut off, i.e. (figuratively) detest
properly, a revolution of time, i.e. an age or generation; also a dwelling
a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
to vacillate, i.e. reel or stray (literally or figuratively); also causative of both
the heart (as the most interior organ);
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
a road (as trodden); figuratively, a course of life or mode of action, often adverb

11.brief: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
to seven oneself, i.e. swear (as if by repeating a declaration seven times)
properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
near, with or among; often in general, to
repose or (adverbially) peacefully; figuratively, consolation (specifically, matrimony); hence (concretely) an abode
